receivedPermissions.description: can authorize an upgrade, update the permissioned prover, disable permissioned prover mode and set the state history retention period.
can call newFinalizedState() to prove the latest HotShot state.

entries.name: HotShotLightClient
entries.description: The DA bridge contract that stores and verifies HotShot state commitments on Ethereum.

issuedPermissions.description: can authorize an upgrade, update the permissioned prover, disable permissioned prover mode and set the state history retention period.
can call newFinalizedState() to prove the latest HotShot state.
